DOC.detailed_description: We prospectively enrol patient acute chest pain visit ED . Exclusion criterion myocardial infarction ( MI ) ST elevation , unstable vital sign , uncontrolled arrhythmia , renal dysfunction , hypersensitivity contrast medium pregnancy . Patients allocate 3 category base history , physical exam , electrocardiogram : 1 ) definite angina uncertainty regard MI ( high risk ) , 2 ) probable angina ( intermediate risk ) , 3 ) low likelihood angina ( low risk ) , randomize either receive MDCT immediately ( MDCT group ) , ( control ) . We compare diagnostic accuracy , length stay ER , admission rate , major adverse cardiac event ( MACE ) clinical diagnosis 1 month discharge ED .
